name: RNFtools
body:
# RNFtools

RNFtools is an associated software package for [Read Naming Format](http://karel-brinda.github.io/rnf-spec/), a generic format for simulated NGS reads (see its [specification](http://karel-brinda.github.io/rnf-spec/RNF.pdf)). The whole package is based on [SnakeMake](https://bitbucket.org/johanneskoester/snakemake/wiki/Home). To install RNFtools, a Unix-like system with Python 3.2+ is required.

## Installation

* Using PIP:

   ```pip install rnftools```

* Using Easy Install:

   ```easy_install rnftools```

## Documentation

A full documentation with tutorials is available on http://rnftools.rtfd.org.
